Song.title: Shine Into Our Night
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Joel Sczebel (C) 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [E | E | F#m | F#m (2X)]
VERSE 1: [E]We are not what we should be We [F#m7]haven’t sought what we should seek We’ve [A]seen Your glory [F#m]Lord, but looked away[E | E] Our [E]hearts are bent our eyes are dim Our [F#m7]finest works are stained with sin And [A]emptiness has [F#m]shadowed all our ways [E | E]
CHORUS: [A]Jesus Chr[E]ist, shine in[Amaj7/C#]to our ni[A]ght Drive our [E]dark away [Amaj7] ‘Til Your [C#m]glory fills our [A]eyes [A]Jesus Chr[E]ist, shine in[Amaj7/C#]to our ni[A]ght Bind us t[E]o Your cross, [Amaj7][ ]where we find l[E]ife
VERSE 2: [E]Still we often go astray We [F#m7]chase the world, forget Your grace But [A]You have never [F#m]failed to bring us back [E | E] Re[E]veal the depths of what You’ve done The [F#m7]death You died, the vic’try won You [A]made a way for [F#m]us to know Your love [E | E]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 we are not what we should be we havent sought what we should seek weve seen your glory lord but looked away our hearts are bent our eyes are dim our finest works are stained with sin and emptiness has shadowed all our ways chorus jesus christ shine into our night drive our dark away til your glory fills our eyes jesus christ shine into our night bind us to your cross where we find life verse 2 still we often go astray we chase the world forget your grace but you have never failed to bring us back reveal the depths of what youve done the death you died the victry won you made a way for us to know your love
